meanings.definition: To make something more appealing to yuppies.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys yuppifying her apartment with trendy decor.
meanings.sent2: The company is yuppifying its marketing strategy to attract young professionals.
meanings.sent3: The cafe started yuppifying its menu by adding avocado toast.
meanings.sent4: His new haircut yuppified his entire look, making him fit in with the trendy crowd.
meanings.sent5: The city park was yuppified with the addition of a fancy coffee shop.

meanings.definition: The act of gentrifying a neighborhood to cater to young urban professionals.
meanings.sent1: Yuppifying of the area led to higher rent prices, pushing out long-time residents.
meanings.sent2: The yuppifying of downtown brought in new cafes and boutiques.
meanings.sent3: The yuppifying of the neighborhood made it harder for locals to afford housing.
meanings.sent4: The rapid yuppifying of the district changed its character completely.
meanings.sent5: The yuppifying of the town attracted a younger, wealthier demographic.
